meanings.definition: To qualify or make eligible again.
meanings.sent1: After studying hard, she requalifies for the scholarship.
meanings.sent2: He needs to requalify for the job by passing the test again.
meanings.sent3: The cat requalifies for treats after performing tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication requalifies her as a top candidate for the position.
meanings.sent5: Practice requalifies him as a skilled player on the team.

meanings.definition: To meet the necessary requirements again.
meanings.sent1: The athlete requalifies for the competition by achieving the qualifying time.
meanings.sent2: She must requalify for the program by submitting updated documents.
meanings.sent3: The robot requalifies for the race after a software upgrade.
meanings.sent4: His hard work requalifies him as a contender for the award.
meanings.sent5: The repair work requalifies the building for occupancy.
